name: Pragmatic Works
description:
Pragmatic Works specializes in Business Intelligence, Advanced Analytics, and Cloud solutions based on the Microsoft Data Platform. We've helped over 800 customers leverage their data to produce powerful insights that fuel competitive advantages. Our strategic relationship with Microsoft allows us to better serve our customers through supplemental project funding, early access to technology previews, and a direct line to Microsoft Product Management.
We're especially proud of the awards and designations we've been granted over the years which include: 
2017 Microsoft Data Platform Partner of the Year: Runner-Up 
10x Microsoft Gold Partner: Data Platform / Analytics / Cloud 
5x Microsoft National Solution Provider 
5x Microsoft Analytics Platform Partner of the Year
5x Microsoft / HP Frontline Partnership 
With Pragmatic Works, you're not working with an IT Services firm... you're establishing a technology partner to help make your digital transformation vision a reality.
